name: Nephalem
description:
Nepahlem! Gun down angels and demons in a fast paced tactical bullet hell!

Goal destroy the Nexus in the center of the screen by absorbing enemy bullets and discharging them back!
**Controls**
Right Click (Down): Divine Shield, absorbs yellow bullets.

Right Click (Up): Discharges the energy you absorbed with divine shield.

Left Click (Down): Void Shield, absorbs red bullets.

Left Click (Up): Discharges the energy you absorbed with void shield.

W,A,S,D Space

*Tip: Taking damage will immediately discharge your shield.* 

*Tip: You can't absorb the green bullets coming from the nexus. Dodge them.

Artist:

Lemonthunder
